title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Personalized Adaptive Learning Design and Management Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using foundational Learning Management Systems (LMS) and basic expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Apply an IMS LD-based design framework modeling interactions between learning activities with over 80% accuracy
Derive three or more optimal learning sequences using case-based reasoning (CBR) through learner needs analysis
Establish personalized learning plans reflecting diverse job requirements through BPEL-based scalable learning sequence design
Develop a prototype dynamically adjusting learning paths based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
